Dodge: +1 AC/+1 CMD

Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Toughness: +17 HP
Catch Off-Guard: Using an improvised melee weapon inflicts no penalty and makes unarmed foes flat-footed
Defensive Stance: Voluntary immobility gives +2 AC, +4 Strength, +4 Constitution, and +2 Will for 24 rd/8 hr rest; fatigued afterwards for 2 rd per rd in stance
Halting Blow: Successful movement AOO halts foe during stance
Immobile: +10 CMD vs. bull rush, overrun, pull, push, and movement grapple during stance
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may deal lethal damage
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 14+
Increased Damage Reduction: +1 DR/- during rage or stance
Intercept: May suffer damage from attack directed at adjacent ally during stance 1/rd
Last Word: May make extra attack w/dbl damage when hit to self results in negative HP or unconsciousness 1/dy
Leaping Attack: +1 attack and damage after 5' move
Lunge: May suffer -2 AC to gain +5' melee range
Mighty Resilience: May negate extra damage and effects from crit or sneak attack 1/stance
Mobile Defense: May take 5' step during stance
Paired Opportunists: +4 AOO and share ally AOO when adjacent ally has same feat and threatens same foe
Quick Draw: May draw weapon as free action
Renewed Defense: May regain 5d8+2 HP during stance 1/dy
Roused Defense: May use stance while fatigued; immune to fatigued during stance, exhausted afterward for 10 min per rd in stance
Shield Wall: +1 shield AC bonus when adjacent ally has same feat and buckler or light shield; +2 w/heavy or tower shield
Smash (Stalwart Defender): May make extra shield bash or slam attack for 1d4+1 HP 1/rd during stance
Strike Back: May ready melee attack against melee foes that are out of range
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC (foe feint neg)
Unexpected Strike: May take AOO when foe enters threat area 1/rage or stance
Save: Fortitude: +12; Reflex: +6; Will: +10

Wisdom Will Adjustment: +3
Agility: +2 vs. paralyzed, slowed, and entangled
Clear Mind: May reroll Will save 1/rage or stance
Endurance: +4 extended physical action
Fearless Defense: Immune to shaken and frightened during stance
Heart Of The Fields: May ignore fatigued or exhausted effect 1/dy
Internal Fortitude: Immune to sickened and nauseated during rage or stance
